CustomField.formula: Is_Falcon__c =false && ArrivalWindowStartTime >= NOW()-2/24 && ArrivalWindowStartTime <= Now()+1/24 && (ISPICKVAL(Status, "Open")||ISPICKVAL(Status, "Rejected")) && (SLA_Name__c = "CBUD CB" || SLA_Name__c = "Best Effort" || SLA_Name__c = "Sched" || SLA_Name__c = "2BD" || SLA_Name__c = "CompB" || SLA_Name__c = "ZZ DO NOT USE Over 48 Hours" || SLA_Name__c = "NBD" || SLA_Name__c = "ZZ DO NOT USE 24 to 48 Hours" || SLA_Name__c = "Sched Short Notice AH Under 24 hrs" || SLA_Name__c = "Sched Short Notive AH 24 to 48 hrs" || SLA_Name__c = "(none)")
CustomField.label: Non MTTR About to Miss Appointment
